title: Team AVID is looking for players!

embed.description: We at AVGN are passionate to grow the eSports scene, and we wish to establish a positive presence in Singapore/Malaysian SEA Garena region. Hence we are scouting a full roster team to play for Team AVID! Similarily to our OCE roster recruitment, we are looking for passionate casual League of Legends players who are seeking an established team to play in competitive scenes.

body:
We are looking for the following:

Marksman
Mid Laner
 

To be apart of Team AVID, applicant must require:

At least Diamond III ranking in SoloQ
An overall posititve team player attitude
Able to commit times for scrims or tournaments
 

Got what it takes? Send your applications to teamavidgn@gmail.com with the following format:

Name:
In-Game Name:
Age:
Location:
OP.GG or Screenshot of your ranking:
Any previous experience in team environment gaming? (If so, can you briefly describe your experience and why you left):
Why do you want to join Team AVID?:

replies.body: Im only D5 but i can try :(
